data.text: We collect personal data such as name, email, and phone number.
data.description: This practice involves gathering personal information from users.

data.text: Your data will be used to provide services and improve user experience.
data.description: This practice outlines how the collected data will be utilized.

data.text: We share your data with third-party service providers for processing.
data.description: This practice describes the sharing of personal data with external entities.

data.text: You have the right to access, rectify, and delete your personal data.
data.description: This practice informs users of their rights regarding their personal data.

data.text: We retain your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined.
data.description: This practice explains the duration for which personal data will be stored.
